DOC.brief_title: Manipulative Treatment Children With Neck Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Parents receive text message [ SMS ) weekly basis inquire child 's musculoskeletal pain well amount type sport leisure time past week . Following report pain , parent interview phone member clinical team , consist two licensed physical therapist two licensed chiropractor , thorough description complaint . Based , interviewer determines whether complaint negligible whether child see member clinical team , case child examine school . At examination , child evaluate inclusion exclusion criterion .
DOC.criteria: Pain neck back equal great 3 11box numerical rating scale three day . If serious pathology injury suspect , child refer secondary care sport injury center diagnostic workup and/or image . Handicaps prevent normal physical activity .
